class_description:
This class implements an output stream filter for writing files in the
 ZIP file format. Includes support for both compressed and uncompressed
 entries.

Methods.method_description:
Creates a new ZIP output stream.

 
The UTF-8 charset is used
 to encode the entry names and comments.

params.param_description:
the charset
                to be used to encode the entry names and comments

Methods.method_description: Creates a new ZIP output stream.
Closes the ZIP output stream as well as the stream being filtered.

Closes the current ZIP entry and positions the stream for writing
 the next entry.

Finishes writing the contents of the ZIP output stream without closing
 the underlying stream. Use this method when applying multiple filters
 in succession to the same output stream.

params.param_description: the ZIP entry to be written

Methods.method_description:
Begins writing a new ZIP file entry and positions the stream to the
 start of the entry data. Closes the current entry if still active.
 The default compression method will be used if no compression method
 was specified for the entry, and the current time will be used if
 the entry has no set modification time.

Sets the compression level for subsequent entries which are DEFLATED.
 The default setting is DEFAULT_COMPRESSION.

Sets the default compression method for subsequent entries. This
 default will be used whenever the compression method is not specified
 for an individual ZIP file entry, and is initially set to DEFLATED.

params.param_description: the start offset in the data
the number of bytes that are written

Methods.method_description:
Writes an array of bytes to the current ZIP entry data. This method
 will block until all the bytes are written.
